  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3182</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3182</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">La formiga</string>
            <string language="en">The ant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Ameise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La fourmi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A formiga</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La formica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το μυρμήγκι</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Joc mitjançant el qual es guia una formiga per diferents túnels amb l'objectiu d'atresorar, en llocs concrets, els aliments que ha recollit prèviament. Mentre duu a terme la seva tasca ha d'eludir perills, com ara: una aranya, despreniments de pedres...</string>
            <string language="en">A game in which the player guides an ant through different tunnels with the idea of storing food in certain places, while at the same time avoid dangers, such as spiders, rockfalls, etc.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">atenció</string>
            <string language="en">attention</string>
            <string language="es">atención</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">orientació</string>
            <string language="en">gear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">percepció</string>
            <string language="en">perception</string>
            <string language="es">percepción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">habilitat</string>
            <string language="en">skill</string>
            <string language="es">habilidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Spiel, in dem der Spieler eine Ameise durch 
unterschiedliche Tunnels mit der Idee der Speicherung der Nahrung in 
bestimmten Plätzen führen, während gleichzeitig Gefahren, wie 
Spinnen, rockfalls vermeiden Sie, usw..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un jeu dans lequel le joueur guident une fourmi 
par différents tunnels avec l'idée d'enregistrer la nourriture dans 
certains endroits, tandis qu'évitez en même temps les dangers, tels 
que des araignées, les rockfalls, etc...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um jogo em que o jogador guia uma formiga 
através dos túneis diferentes com a idéia de armazenar o alimento 
em determinados lugares, quando evite ao mesmo tempo perigos, tais 
como aranhas, rockfalls, etc..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un gioco in cui il giocatore guida una formica 
tramite i trafori differenti con l'idea di memorizzare l'alimento in 
determinati posti, mentre allo stesso tempo eviti i pericoli, quali i 
ragni, i rockfalls, ecc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα παιχνίδι στο οποίο ο παίκτης καθοδηγεί ένα 
μυρμήγκι μέσω των διαφορετικών σηράγγων με την ιδέα της 
καταχώρησης των τροφίμων σε ισχύ ορισμένες, ενώ συγχρόνως 
αποφύγετε τους κινδύνους, όπως οι αράχνες, rockfalls, κ.λπ....</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufmerksamkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zahnrad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorstellung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fähigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">attention</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
